docComment:
/**
 * Provides a {@link @veramo/selective-disclosure#ISelectiveDisclosure | plugin} for the {@link @veramo/core#Agent} that implements {@link @veramo/selective-disclosure#SelectiveDisclosure} interface.
 *
 * Provides a {@link @veramo/selective-disclosure#SdrMessageHandler | plugin} for the {@link @veramo/message-handler#MessageHandler} that detects Selective Disclosure Request in a message
 *
 * @packageDocumentation
 */
name: @veramo/selective-disclosure

members.docComment:
/**
 * Profile data
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: ICreateProfileCredentialsArgs
holder
name
picture
save
send
url
verifier

members.docComment:
/**
 * Contains the parameters of a Selective Disclosure Request.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * See {@link https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/messages/sharereq.md | Selective Disclosure Request} specs
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: ICreateSelectiveDisclosureRequestArgs

members.docComment:
/**
 * Describes a particular credential that is being requested
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * See {@link https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/messages/sharereq.md | Selective Disclosure Request}
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: ICredentialRequestInput
claimType
claimValue
credentialContext
credentialType
essential
issuers
reason

members.docComment:
/**
 * The credentials that make up a response of a Selective Disclosure
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * See {@link https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/messages/sharereq.md | Selective Disclosure Request}
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: ICredentialsForSdr

members.docComment:
/**
 * Encapsulates the params needed to gather credentials to fulfill a Selective disclosure request.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * See {@link https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/messages/sharereq.md | Selective Disclosure Request} specs
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IGetVerifiableCredentialsForSdrArgs
did
sdr

members.docComment:
/**
 * The result of a selective disclosure response validation.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IPresentationValidationResult

members.docComment:
/**
 * Describes the interface of a Selective Disclosure plugin.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * See {@link https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/messages/sharereq.md | Selective Disclosure Request}
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: ISelectiveDisclosure

members.docComment:
/**
 * Represents the Selective Disclosure request parameters.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * See {@link https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/messages/sharereq.md | Selective Disclosure Request}
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: ISelectiveDisclosureRequest
claims
credentials
issuer
replyUrl
subject

members.docComment:
/**
 * Used for requesting Credentials using Selective Disclosure. Represents an accepted issuer of a credential.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: Issuer
did
url

members.docComment:
/**
 * A tuple used to verify a Selective Disclosure Response. Encapsulates the response(`presentation`) and the corresponding request (`sdr`) that made it.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: IValidatePresentationAgainstSdrArgs

members.docComment:
/**
 * Identifies a {@link @veramo/core-types#IMessage} that represents a Selective Disclosure Request
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * See {@link https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/messages/sharereq.md | Selective Disclosure Request} This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: MessageTypes

members.docComment:
/**
 * A Veramo message handler plugin that can decode an incoming Selective Disclosure Response into the internal Message representation.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: SdrMessageHandler

members.docComment:
/**
 * This class adds support for creating {@link https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/flows/selectivedisclosure.md | Selective Disclosure} requests and interpret the responses received.
 *
 * This implementation of the uPort protocol uses {@link https://www.w3.org/TR/vc-data-model/#presentations | W3C Presentation} as the response encoding instead of a `shareReq`.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: SelectiveDisclosure

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates profile credentials
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: createProfilePresentation

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a Selective disclosure request, encoded as a JWT.
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * See {@link https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/flows/selectivedisclosure.md | Selective Disclosure}
 *
 * @param args - The param object with the properties necessary to create the request. See {@link ISelectiveDisclosureRequest}
 *
 * @param context - *RESERVED* This is filled by the framework when the method is called.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: createSelectiveDisclosureRequest

members.docComment:
/**
 * Gathers the required credentials necessary to fulfill a Selective Disclosure Request. It uses a {@link @veramo/core-types#IDataStoreORM} plugin implementation to query the local database for the required credentials.
 *
 * @param args - Contains the Request to be fulfilled and the DID of the subject
 *
 * @param context - *RESERVED* This is filled by the framework when the method is called.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: getVerifiableCredentialsForSdr

members.docComment:
/**
 * Validates a {@link https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/flows/selectivedisclosure.md | Selective Disclosure response} encoded as a `Presentation`
 *
 * @param args - Contains the request and the response `Presentation` that needs to be checked.
 *
 * @param context - *RESERVED* This is filled by the framework when the method is called.
 *
 * This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.
 *
 * @beta
 */
members.name: validatePresentationAgainstSdr
